metadata.title: CVE-2021-28877 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description: In the standard library in Rust before 1.51.0, the Zip implementation calls __iterator_get_unchecked() for the same index more than once when nested. This bug can lead to a memory safety violation due to an unmet safety requirement for the TrustedRandomAccess trait.

criterions.comment: rustc package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
